channel.title: Vampire Cloak for trade
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Vampire Cloak for trade" - Looking for a Bear Coat, Magical Wand or a Go Piece.

item.title: Vampire Cloak for trade
item.content:encoded:
I have a Vampire Cloak (+1 Nin strength) for trade and I would be interested in trading that for a Bear Coat, Go Piece or Magical Wand. Go Piece is the most desirable, but I think it's a lot worthier than a Vampire Cloak anyway.

Also have a Necklace of the First HoCage, a few Ninja Puppets and Dogs among Heck Butterflies and Swallowtail butterflies. I'll be willing to trade these for a reasonable amount of Smoke Bombs (but not for the Cloak) if you're interested.

Make an offer and we'll see where it goes.
